qas.question: What characteristics has Beyonce received acclaim for?
Which former president of Def Jam called Beyonce the greatest entertainer alive?
For what does Beyonce receive praise?
Who chose her as number one on his list of Best singers/ Dancers?
How has L.A. Reid described her?
How does Alice Jones describe her?
Who has Beyoncé at number one on her Five Best Singer/Dancers?
Who has said that Beyoncé is the best entertainer alive?

context: Beyoncé has received praise for her <a0_0><a2_0>stage presence<a2_0/> and voice<a0_0/> during live performances. <a3_0><a6_0>Jarett Wieselman<a6_0/><a3_0/> of the New York Post placed her at number one on her list of the Five Best Singer/Dancers. According to Barbara Ellen of The Guardian Beyoncé is the most in-charge female artist she's seen onstage, while Alice Jones of The Independent wrote she "takes her role as entertainer so seriously <a5_0>she's almost too good<a5_0/>." The ex-President of Def Jam <a1_0><a7_0>L.A. Reid<a7_0/><a1_0/> has described Beyoncé as the <a4_0>greatest entertainer alive<a4_0/>. Jim Farber of the Daily News and Stephanie Classen of Star Phoenix both praised her strong voice and her stage presence.
